send_money_in_few_seconds: With PayMyBuddy, send money to your friends and family for free in seconds.
no_delay: No need to wait several days for a transfer.
registration_is_free: And opening an account is free.
best_cryptography: To protect you against bank fraud, we use the best encryption methods available on the market.
easy_cancellation: And in case of problems, you can easily cancel unwanted transactions.
pay_from_any_devices: With your PayMyBuddy account, you can donate to a charity or reimburse your loved ones from your computer, tablet or smartphone.
